alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Grant; Norman; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 8:51AM CDT until March 30 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, northwest and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; Grant; Norman; Wadena
